sentences: Jun Shibata (柴田 淳, Shibata Jun, born November 19, 1976 in Setagaya, Tokyo), nicknamed "Shibajun", is a Japanese pop female singer-songwriter.
In 2016 she was diagnosed with partial hearing loss.
